Question: UltraSense Systems CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
UltraSense Systems

Product Highlight: UltraSense Systems will be showcasing their latest HMI Controller IC’s, InPlane Sensing PCBA modules, and Plug & Play Solid Surface Touch Modules at CES 2024. The product demonstrations will include automotive interior and exterior use cases, such as solid surface center consoles, steering wheels with no mechanical stalks, 'Shytech' touch sensing, car door release solutions, solid surface touch modules for motorized charge port doors, and touch-on-metal implementations. Additionally, they will display automotive customers’ products in production vehicles in early 2024.

Features:
- Showcasing latest HMI Controller IC’s, InPlane Sensing PCBA modules, and Plug & Play Solid Surface Touch Modules
- Demonstrations of automotive interior and exterior use cases
- Solid surface touch modules for various automotive applications
- Touch-on-metal implementations
- Automotive customers’ products in production vehicles

Location: LVCC West Hall Booth 4477
Website: https://lnkd.in/gcXsGcS6
#CES2024 #AutomotiveTechnology
Summary_cn:
UltraSense Systems

产品亮点：UltraSense Systems将在CES 2024展示他们最新的HMI控制器IC、InPlane Sensing PCBA模块和Plug & Play Solid Surface触控模块。产品演示将包括汽车内部和外部的用例，如实心表面中控台、没有机械杆的方向盘、'Shytech'触摸感应、车门释放解决方案、电动充电口实心表面触摸模块以及金属触控实现。此外，他们还将展示汽车客户在2024年初生产车辆中的产品。

特点：
- 展示最新的HMI控制器IC、InPlane Sensing PCBA模块和Plug & Play Solid Surface触控模块
- 汽车内部和外部用例的演示
- 各种汽车应用的实心触控模块
- 金属触控实现
- 汽车客户在生产车辆中的产品

地点：LVCC西馆4477展位
网址：https://lnkd.in/gcXsGcS6
#CES2024 #汽车科技
